title: Water tomatoes in Greenhouse 1
description: Check soil moisture and water tomato plants. Ensure drip irrigation system is functioning properly.

title: Apply fertilizer to sweet corn
description: Side-dress corn with nitrogen fertilizer. Use 150 lbs/acre of urea.

title: Harvest winter wheat
description: Weather window looks good for harvesting. Check grain moisture content before combining.

title: Weed control in soybean field
description: Post-emergence weed control. Scout for weeds and apply herbicide if needed.

title: Plant second succession of lettuce
description: Plant another row of buttercrunch lettuce for continuous harvest.

title: Service tractor engine
description: Change oil, replace air filter, and check hydraulic fluid levels on the main tractor.

title: Check irrigation lines
description: Inspect all irrigation lines for leaks or clogs. Repair as needed before peak summer season.

title: Soil test for fall planting
description: Collect soil samples from fields planned for fall crops. Test for pH and nutrient levels.
